00065 // The definition of the MemoryFragment will probably
00066 // be OS-dependant since the goal is to allow this data
00067 // structure to be passed directly to I/O routines that take
00068 // scatter/gather arrays.
00069 #if ( OSCL_MEMFRAG_PTR_BEFORE_LEN )
00070 
00071 struct OsclMemoryFragment
00072 {
00073     void *ptr;
00074     uint32 len;
00075 };
00076 
00077 #else

00082 };
